review: Looking for a place for a snack after a movie. It is a very fun place and the staff are friendly and helpful. A bit noisy though. Good selections of snacks and food that can be shared, as we did with our group. Fast service...

We had a small gathering for a friend moving overseas. Once again, we chose Kinka because of its great food and loud and fun atmosphere.
Usually, I chose fish. Either sashimi or their tasty black cod.
This time, we decided to go for prix fixe...

Out for lunch with my daughter -- she suggested going here. Had to ask for water. Throughout the meal, whenever I asked for anything (several times), I was always ignored when the server returned. They always deferred to my daughter, as if I didn't exist....
I went there multiple times and the food was great every time. The staff is friendly and the service is very quick. I would recommend to try the weekly specials.

the best Japanese izakaya in North York probably in GTA area.
must order: tako wasabi, fried chicken and beef ribs

For a celebratory get-together, we met at Kinka Izakaya and had a good time at lunch on Sun. Brie cheese was tasty deep-fried, and the twist on sizzling Korean rice-bowl was savoury (but not enough vegetables). The ramen noodle was okay. I think the mackerel...

Went to this restaurant with my daughter and her friend when I visited Toronto in April.
The staff were very engaged and friendly, shouting a cheery welcome to guests as we arrived. The food was great, very generous servings and nicely presented. What won us...

A friend who lives in Toronto recommended this restaurant to us as their Saba Oshizushi (blowtorched seared pressed mackerel sushi) was something to die for. She wasn't wrong.
We went for lunch and the restaurant was quiet - you get greeted but staff yelling 'Irasshaimase!'...

This is the perfect type of restaurant for anyone who enjoys variety. Everything is portioned to sample size so you don't feel like you can't order more things to try. Pricing is reasonable as well.
However, if you are someone who enjoys quiet conversations over...

Well laid out and aesthetically quite pleasing. Atmosphere is warm and alive as staff greet and bid farewell to all patrons. The menu was full of tempting options. Ordered about 8 dishes, including dessert, and would eagerly enjoy them again. Exceeded expectations.
